verbs.description: Trump [V: will] try to craft a path toward North Korea 's Kim Jong Un giving up the country 's nuclear and missile programs .
[ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: try] [ARG1: to craft a path toward North Korea 's Kim Jong Un giving up the country 's nuclear and missile programs] .
[ARG0: Trump] will try to [V: craft] [ARG1: a path toward North Korea 's Kim Jong Un giving up the country 's nuclear and missile programs] .
Trump will try to craft a path toward [ARG0: North Korea 's Kim Jong Un] [V: giving] up [ARG1: the country 's nuclear and missile programs] .
